text-align: left;">CH<sub>2</sub>OH</td></tr></table>Above is a Fischer projection of the monosaccharide D-alloheptulose. text-align: left;">CH<sub>2</sub>OH</td></tr></table>Above is a Fischer projection of the monosaccharide D-alloheptulose.
